name: study ii
description:
oil on canvas

what I call matter is, ultimately, information being articulated and plastic-visually processed. In this context, my exploration with the paintings showed me that during each new
invested, the paintings become something else that no longer what it was before, showing more and more inconsistent findings that point to evidence of a loss of identity of
elements, and going towards metamorphoses that are possible by the sex between everything.

tThis series is an attempt to treat the metamorphic manifestations of plastic matter are approached as transformations of it and its symptoms, transformations which record and generate new visual information...
